name: Music Squares
description:
Music Squares is an experimental music creation sandbox game.

Music Squares is all about experimenting and discovering cool sounding patterns.

In Music Squares you can combine sounds in a self-playing chain. It's done simply by drawing on game field to continue existing chain. A signal travels through the chain and plays a sound on ending square.

You can edit sample rate, volume and even cut sounds from a bigger sound wave. Also it's possible to record your own sounds through microphone.

Check in-game help to learn more!
